name: Repeat after me (gojushin, JamJamTeam, Clyfdir, bottleofpfeffi)
name_original: Repeat after me (gojushin, JamJamTeam, Clyfdir, bottleofpfeffi)
description:
Repeat after me is a third-person puzzle game, where you try to escape an almost magical confinement with the ability to create copies of yourself at any time that then loop through the last executed actions.

It's a multiplayer puzzle game, where multiple characters are controlled by a single player. This allows the puzzles to have the complexity of multiplayer settings while still being an experience that a player can have alone.
